story:
Short Summary

We are a crew of five university students, based in Perth, Western Australia.  We are making this film as we believe it is important to tell the stories of people who endured persecution to save others, amidst great adversity.

Funding will allow us to finish the project and also enable the film to be submitted into various film festivals.

 

Crew

Director/Writer - Justice Goodrick

Producers - Anthony Kang & Justice Goodrick

Assistant Producer - Michael de Rooy

 

Overview

We are aiming for $2,500.  Even the smallest donations will go a long way. Funding will go into catering for our large cast and crew of 12+, as well as paying for hiring locations such as historical old buildings and covering the cost of our casts' fuel and parking fees. 

If we don't reach out entire goal, the funds will still help us cover some of the costs. Every cent donated will help us finish our goal of making this film come to life.

The Impact

We started out making this film because we did not want the world to forget the horrors committed by the Nazi regime. We also want the world to remember the individuals who paid the ultimate price to protect the vulnerable. 

In terms of our previous track record, we have made a 'pilot' version of this film that was shown at Curtin's 16th Razor film festival. However, we are re-making the film in order to fix historical inaccuracies with costuming as well as building a more in-depth world that we are portraying.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to fund our film, we would greatly appreciate if you share this page on social media sites.
story_txt:
Short Summary
We are a crew of five university students, based in Perth, Western Australia.  We are making this film as we believe it is important to tell the stories of people who endured persecution to save others, amidst great adversity.
Funding will allow us to finish the project and also enable the film to be submitted into various film festivals.
 
Crew
Director/Writer - Justice Goodrick
Producers - Anthony Kang & Justice Goodrick
Assistant Producer - Michael de Rooy
 

Overview
We are aiming for $2,500.  Even the smallest donations will go a long way. Funding will go into catering for our large cast and crew of 12+, as well as paying for hiring locations such as historical old buildings and covering the cost of our casts' fuel and parking fees.

The Impact
We started out making this film because we did not want the world to forget the horrors committed by the Nazi regime. We also want the world to remember the individuals who paid the ultimate price to protect the vulnerable. 
In terms of our previous track record, we have made a 'pilot' version of this film that was shown at Curtin's 16th Razor film festival. However, we are re-making the film in order to fix historical inaccuracies with costuming as well as building a more in-depth world that we are portraying.

story:
The Story 

Curl is a fictional short about Jade, a black high school freshman, who is growing up in a predominately white environment.  When it hits national news that black kid was killed by a police officer, it seems to be all everyone can talk about. When her white friends say some racially insensitive comments, Jade is made to feel ostracized in a place she used to feel so safe. She then has to comes to terms with what it really means to be black.  

My name is Ayanna Smith and I'm a senior Digital Filmmaking Major at Stephens College. Curl is my senior capstone project. Growing up in a predominately white environment myself, I know how much of  an "other" you can feel. I wish I had a film that showed what I was feeling and validated my existence. I hope this film does this for other girls out there in similar situations.  

Where are the Funds Going?

  • Location
  • Art Direction
  •  Food for Crew and Cast
  •  Film Festival Applications and Fees 

The funds are truly going to make the film come to life. We want viewers to be fully immersed in Jade's world, and this can only be done if we accurately portray her world.  

By donating money, you will have exclusive access to the film and merch! Make sure to check out the perks area for more details. 

Why Curl?

It's no secret that representation in media is a major issue that entertainment is facing right now. And although it is getting better, there is still a long way to go. In fact, in 2016, 78.1% of roles in films where portrayed as white actors.  (https://socialsciences.ucla.edu/wp-content/uplo...). 

I've always been interested in hearing new experiences and voices that highlight everyday struggles that many people aren't aware of.  I believe Curl does just that. There are so many stories out there that have yet to be shared, and this is my little piece to give.

Other Ways!

If you can't contribute, no big deal! You can share this with other people who might be interested! Also,  like and follow us on our social media pages and follow us along on this journey!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/curlshortfilm/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/curlshortfilm/

story:
More About The Movie

Nothing But the Blood revolves around two characters, Jessica and Thomas. Both are drawn together by their disillusionment with religion,  and the fact that Thomas has a leadership role within the church only complicates that. When Thomas chooses to leave the church to pursue a relationship with Jessica, the other leaders within the church refuse to sit idly by.

When harm and hate are carried out in the name of religion, how do you respond? Do you fight fire with fire? Do you turn the other cheek? Can such hate ever be truly extinguished? Nothing But the Blood  examines that dilemma. 

How You Can Help

Your contribution to Nothing But the Blood will enable us to rent equipment, pay cast and crew, secure filming locations, obtain music rights, and submit to film festivals. We understand that money is tight, and we've set up a selection of perks that ensure you get something out of this as well. 

Not able to donate? Another great way you can help Nothing But the Blood is by sharing this page with others. 

More About Us

DANIEL TUCKER - Writer/Director

Daniel is a writer and director based in San Antonio, TX. His extensive background in film criticism led him to pursue his life-long dream of bringing his own stories to life. Daniel has a background in no-budget filmmaking, and he hopes Nothing But the Blood will mark his transition to budgeted features. His DVR is 99% Turner Classic Movies. 

RACHEL HUDSON - Actress/Producer

Rachel grew up  in Austin, TX before going to NYU, where she graduated with a degree in Film and TV Production. After working in production for a few years she finally decided to follow her dream and began pursuing acting full-time. She met Daniel when she played the lead in his first film last year.

The Characters

        

Jessica - Rachel Hudson            Thomas - Jordan O'Neal   

      

Michael - Nick Triola                     Father - Les Best                         


     

Katie - Vivian Glazier                   Seth - Austin Hall

 

          

Georgine - Jordan Hancock      Dani - April Hartman                    

Arcadia - Aria Goodson

Learn more about our cast and the characters they are playing by visiting our Facebook!

Thank You!

Thank you so very much for your time and contributions! Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have any questions. We look forward to going on this journey with you!

story:
Watch the Teaser Trailer
 
 

About Straitjacket

Action, Suspense, Dramatic Characters, Emotional Scenes, Straitjacket has it all. Plus...

  • Wolf, played by Phillip Wiedenheft, is a struggling veteran who has returned home to a series of odd jobs, bills he can’t pay, dependence on drugs, and a child he can’t support.
  • Lola, played by Katelynn E. Newberry, struggles with addiction and loss in Dayton, Ohio; an epicenter for the opioid crisis in the Midwest. Lola is facing her own struggles when she is suddenly brought into Wolf’s life after a violent encounter in the woods.
  • Supporting performances by professional actors from across the U.S. Each of them help to further the story and bring emotion, pathos, and energy to the screen.

Wanna learn more? Support this project and make our vision a reality!

Who We Are

In case someone sent you this link and you don’t already know us, but you’re interested in the project, we thought we’d introduce ourselves...

  • Phillip Wiedenheft is the writer/director/lead actor/co-producer. Born and raised in Dayton, Ohio Phillip attended Carroll High School, Sinclair, Wright State and the New York Film Academy. Phillip has a daughter and was recently married.
  • Sean Mangan- the films producer - also attended Wright State. Sean’s parents, Bill and Annette, are local business owners, and have been long-time supporters of this and other film projects.

What We Need

$10,000 sounds like a lot of money, especially for a film that’s already 99% finished filming. Here’s what your support would help us do:

  • Complete Filming Final Scene
  • Editing
  • Coloring
  • Sound Mixing and Music
  • Film festival submissions
  • Marketing and Distribution

How You Can Help

  • Donate! Anything you can give will help us achieve our goals.
  • Even if you can’t afford to give money, please like and share our social media posts with the link to this page.
  • Tell your friends about this project. Word-of-mouth is the best kind of marketing.

What You Get

  • Anyone who gives $20 or more will be invited to our premieres in Dayton and Columbus (Date/Location TBD)
  • Anyone who contributes will be thanked in the final credits of the film.
  • Anyone who contributes will receive a Digital Copy of the film for their collection.
  • Anyone who contributes $500 or more will automatically be given title and credit of Associate Producer on final credit of film, as well as all other perks.

 

We want to thank the many, many people who have already donated hundreds of hours and thousands of dollars to this project. Please consider donating or sharing this page. We want to add you to the ever-growing list of people will are forever indebted to. Thank you for considering and helping our dream become a reality.

story:
Short Summary

Level Up! will be SkullDuggery Theatre Film's 6th film, not counting the 2 season web series, Stuck.  We have been a Midwest mainstay, filming in Nebraska and Iowa.  We have done comedy, drama, absurdist, and Horror.  Now we want to tackle the  Action/Martial Art genre.

Level Up! has its main characters battling baddies from all kinds of martial arts disciplines. Our lead fight choreographer, Dean Traux,  is a certified Instructor under Dan Inosanto (Bruce Lee's protege.)  

We have a cast and crew of 30 people dedicated to make this a must see action ride!  Reaching our financial goal would allow us to do just that.  We will be filming in unique locations including Beercade, an arcade bar.

Our cast is made up of people not only trained in multiple fighting diciplines, but also are trained and seasoned actors! 

All of SkullDuggery Theatre's films get at least one screening and in some cases have screened across the United States and have won awards.  This short will  be entered into film festivals to expand our reach.

What We Need & What You Get

Having 30 people, at multiple locations, filming long days, with special effects level ups the expenses.  We want to bring you the most creative fights captured by alluring cinematography that will keep you wanting more!  It takes time to prepare all of this, and as you know time is money.  Your donations will allow us to put all that we need together and deliver you a pulse pounding, eye opening experience.

We want you to be part of the experience for us, so your donation will allow you access to videos of behind the scenes footage, interviews, bloopers and more.  Some donations open up access to actually be on set with us, be in the movie and private screenings with cast and crew.

Help us Level Up!

story:
What's it About?

“Elite One” is based on the Award Winning Short Film, "The Norwalk Witness." It follows the story of Will Riley who is part of a classified Black Ops team, "The Elite 12." When he arrives home from a mission his whole world changes when his home is brutally attacked. When he tracks down those responsible and brings his own justice, he vows to fall off the grid and leave the life he once knew behind. But when he gets pulled back into the world he tried to forget, he relies on his former training to survive and bring an end to an underground organized crime ring.

What Makes this Film Special and Possible?

Many independent films fail due to a combination of the following factors: low-quality “look”, simple sets, bad lighting, slow-paced plots, pretentious subject matter, and lack of marketability. This film understands those shortcomings and has adapted this project to overcome them.

The visual quality of a movie is the first aspect of the film that people notice, whether or not one is aware of it.  To make a movie look professional depends on two very important things: the Cinematographer and the lighting.  

Therefore, one key aspect of the budget for this film is the equipment and hiring our cinematographer . Thankfully, we will be bringing Stephen Ling back on board for this project. Stephen’s work on  “The Norwalk Witness was incredible and gave our project a quality cinematic look.  Check out Stephen’s demo reel, by clicking this link https://vimeo.com/189479949

By hiring Stephen we also get full use of the “Black Magic” Mini Ursa Cinema Camera.   Although the footage recorded on a Black Magic Camera is high-definition digital imagery, it is not “video,” and the look is indistinguishable from film. Recent big-budget movies that have used this camera are Ben Hur (2016) (with Morgan Freeman), The Infiltrator (2016) (starring Bryan Cranston and John Luguizamo), and Jason Bourne (2009) (staring Matt Damon and Tommy Lee Jones).

This film will not have any constructed sets, but it will utilize a variety of interior locations to keep the story visually interesting. As previously mentioned, to give the film a high-budget look, beautiful, vast, desolate locations around or in the Los Angeles area will serve as a character and a marketing tool for the film.

Many action and suspense scenes staggered throughout the film will give both a visual interest to the story. This story, while including poignant and moving scenes, will be balanced with both a strong depth of story and very strong action sequences. These are the marketing elements necessary to this film to help it find its audience.

We are also fortunate to have a strong cast.  One cast member, in particular, is Hakeemshady Mohamed. Hakeem has quite an amazing backstory. He came to the U.S. as a refugee from war-torn Somalia, so his road to success in Hollywood has not been easy.  

He most recently co-starred in “Submergence” opposite Academy Award Winner, Alicia Vikaner (Tombraider), and James McAvoy (X-Men).  He is also currently in Production on “Triple Frontier,” Starring Ben Affleck.

Hakeem’s career is on the rise and having someone like him in our film gives us a very strong chance of securing distribution.  Please visit our website at www.eliteonemovie.com to see other key cast members.  

Why Help These Filmmakers?

These filmmakers do not like to “sell” themselves but will answer this question numerically.

1. You want to support those who are following their dreams and isn’t letting reality get in the way like it does for so many people.

2. You (like all of us) live for good movies and powerful movie moments.

3. You want to donate or invest your money and see a tangible product as a result.

4. You believe in a filmmaker’s talent and want to give both them and the crew a chance.

5. You recognize that these filmmakers are not the “producer types” with an inflated ego and

empty promises, and you see that these filmmakers are completely straight forward from the

get-go.

6. You want to support moviemaking and you recognize that movies would not exist

without donors and investors like yourself.

7. You are interested in the story and want to see it reach fruition.

8. You want to be the reason that a single film (and hopefully the following films by the

filmmaker) exists.

9. You know that these filmmakers take extreme pride and dedication in their work and will

work endlessly until a feature film that satisfies their high standards is created.

Why we need you?

We need help with funding certain requirements from SAG (Screen Actors Guild).  This will be our first Feature Film that we are seeking SAG approval on.  Becoming a SAG approved project opens the door for us to be able to work with top talent, and become SAG Signatory Producers.  However, before we can become a SAG approved project there are certain requirements that we must meet, such as:  

1.  Required Production/Workers Compensation Insurance, and

2. Required pay rates for certain cast members, such as Stunt Coordinators.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • If you can't contribute financially, get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • And please use the Indiegogo share tools for immediate posts to your social media.

story:
Plot

Arkangel is set in the not too distant future. In the midst of a civil war, rescue missions are carried out by The Arkangel Humanitarian Aid project. A militarised border around the last functioning city makes it difficult for these missions to be carried out.

Siblings Jack and Rhys, receive an emergency evacuation broadcast from the Arkangel Project. The same emergency broadcast their parents received. As their district is the next one to become engulfed by the war, they have to make a difficult decision. Stay and try and survive the war or risk their lives trying to cross the border.

Why we need the funds:

Arkangel is an ambitious Sci-Fi film and to bring the visions we have from text to screen, we need to hit our goal!

The majority of the funding will go towards the visual FX shots and costume for the film. We need high quality 3D models and stock footage elements for through out the film and the final scene. These will aid in really selling the effect and help the drama unfold. 

Along side getting costumes for the main characters, we also need to clothe a number of extras for certain scenes in this film. The costumes need to match the setting of a collapsing city as civil war consumes each district.

The rest of the funds will go to other production costs such as 

  • Equipment Hire
  • Set decoration and props
  • Travel for cast and crew
  • Refreshments

What do you get?

If you choose to contribute to the creation of this film you can choose from four unique perks.

The Emergency Broadcast:

When you choose this perk, you'll receive a shout out on our social media pages and regular production updates so you know how your contribution to the film is helping! Be sure to leave us your social media details!

Rescue Co-ordinates: 

Choosing this perk will get you a digital shoutout, regular production updates and a personalised thank you video to show you just how much it means to us!

The Border Control Package:

You'll get everything from the other two packages, plus productions materials from the film which include the script, storyboards, shot lists, schedules etc and a digital copy of the film.

The Rescue Package:

Are you ready to be saved by Arkangel? When you select this perk, you'll get everything you need to cross the border. All three previous perks are included with these incredible extras:

  • Behind the scenes featurettes
  • Gag Reel
  • Production skills
  • The Soundtrack
  • An invitation to join the cast and crew for a special Central London screening in January.

We'll give you ample notice about the date and you'll receive a digital invitation to join us for a viewing party in Central London before the film hits the festival circuit.

Will you risk your life to save it? 

It would really mean so much to us to get this film off the ground and bring it to your screens, whether it's a contribution or sharing of the project, every thing you do from here on out, will help us!

Thank you!

Karl Reay

Karl is a British born actor and will be taking on the role of Rhys. Karl has been in various short films and projects in his career as an actor such as 'Wrenched' written and directed by Jonny Ruff.

Elliott Corteil

Elliott will be directing the film whilst taking on the role of Jack. A challenge he has always wanted to over come is directing something he is also in. Elliott has been writing, filming and editing since a young age and has worked on various film projects since picking up his first camera. This will be his directorial debut and first short film.

Robert Moya - Soundtrack

Robert Moya will be scoring the soundtrack for the film. Rob has produced and performed with several bands in his music career. This will be his first time scoring for short Sci-Fi film. 

We're currently in the process of casting our support role of 'Border Patrol Officer'. Holding auditions for the successful shortlisted candidates in the following weeks.

Other crew:

Craig Lambard/Arun Karra - Sound

Ryan Wilson - Cinematography
story_txt:
Plot
Arkangel is set in the not too distant future. In the midst of a civil war, rescue missions are carried out by The Arkangel Humanitarian Aid project. A militarised border around the last functioning city makes it difficult for these missions to be carried out.
Siblings Jack and Rhys, receive an emergency evacuation broadcast from the Arkangel Project. The same emergency broadcast their parents received. As their district is the next one to become engulfed by the war, they have to make a difficult decision. Stay and try and survive the war or risk their lives trying to cross the border.


Why we need the funds:
Arkangel is an ambitious Sci-Fi film and to bring the visions we have from text to screen, we need to hit our goal!
The majority of the funding will go towards the visual FX shots and costume for the film. We need high quality 3D models and stock footage elements for through out the film and the final scene. These will aid in really selling the effect and help the drama unfold.

story:
Short Summary

We are Carnaby International, and we make British movies.

In 2009, we made and released Rise of the Footsoldier. It sold over 7million DVD’s and was the second biggest grossing British gangster films of all time after Lock Stock.

Fast forward to 2017 and we released the 3rd instalment: The Pat Tate Story, another huge film, and we are being asked for more…

So, we are making one last Rise of the Footsolder…

We want to make it the biggest and the best we can. This one is for the fans.

If you want to be a part of Rise of the Footsoldier 4, read on.

What We Need & What You Get

We are making this film for you, the fans, and we want you to be involved. We want to make this film bigger and better.

If you want to be part of the film, you can…

  • Be an extra in the film
  • Come to a screening and see the unfinished film before release
  • Come to the red-carpet premiere (watch our last premiere here: https://youtu.be/v-WO3fQHrzs
  • Come to the wrap party and party with the cast
  • Spend a day on set with the cast and crew
  • And much more…

All funds raised go into not only bringing you into the film but to make our fights scenes bigger and bloodier, our club scenes crazier and more cheese you c***!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can’t contribute? No problem, just give us a bit of support and share this page for us.

 

Please note that filming will be throughout 2018 and early 2019, and the release will be towards the end of 2019.

story:
Short Summary 

Για Ελληνικά κυλίστε σε κάθε ενότητα πιο κάτω !

"Dimos Avdeliodis, one of the most significant contemporary Greek theatre and cinema artists, has associated his name with pioneering  performances and movies, which opened up new creative ways in Art, with international recognition.."

He says about his new film:

Art is intended to inspire and create enthusiasm to people and faith in life.

The feeling that dominates in a period of crisis is insecurity, which creates fear, doubt and negative feelings.

The opposite of fear is not courage but creation and love,  because they do not leave neither time nor space to fear.

I believe in a cinema that

  • focuses on ideas rather than showcasing a director,
  • fascinates its audience rather than scares or condemns them, and
  • emotionally moves them through education and entertainment rather than through only sensational amusement and distractions.

Therefore, cinema should touch our hearts and not divide us but unite us all.

With these firm beliefs, I return to the movie scene with my new film:

“THE SATYRICAL DRAMA OF ATHENS”*

Preparation has been completed and I seek your support in order to be able to start shooting the film to be eligible on time for competitions at upcoming international film festivals.

(*) The Satyrical Drama, which gave the inspiration for the title of this film, goes back to the third distinct genre of Ancient Drama, following Tragedy and Comedy. It combines dreamlike and playful aspects, with unpredictable transitions from drama to comedy.

About the movie

In a carefree state, where Karaghiozis lives, a Dragon suddenly occupies the city's only Aqueduct, and demands to eat as many people as he wants every day, in order to continue supplying water to his inhabitants.

Veziris, the Supreme Lord of the City, decides, with the approval of the Dragon, that everyday Dragon’s victim will be determined by a fair and indisputable draw. He gives his trusted messenger Chatziavatis the assignment to secretly inform the victims of their fate before the dawn, so that by the first light of day the inhabitants can make use of the Aqueduct without the social peace and order disturbed.

One day the draw falls on Veziri’s only daughter, the divinely beautiful Rigopoula…..

----------------

The film is a “dream-like” drama with comedic elements that addresses the current economic issues and social crisis plaguing the world, especially Greece.

The main characters are historical figures of the Greek shadow puppet theatre: Karaghiozis, Chatziavatis, Velighekas and others, who are now portrayed by human actors.

Similarly, heroic and past figures of European tradition and literature also appear: the Little Prince, the Tin Soldier and Don Quixote with Sancho Pancha, all to show how the global crisis intertwines with the Greek domestic crisis.

The aesthetics and dialogues inspired by the unique style of the Shadow Theatre ensure exciting scenes throughout the entire movie, which culminates in the battle of little Alexander with the Dragon.

All these elements make for an original film, suited for all ages, regardless of their nationality and educational background.

THE MAIN CHARACTERS

KARAGHIOZIS is the modern man, hungry and thirsty, who tries to survive in any way he can, seeing his problems as fate as well as an impetus for new adventures. He adapts reality to his own perceptions of truth, attempting anything to reach his goals regardless of practicality.

ALEXANDER THE GREAT is the pure, childlike soul who is full of love, with no room for fear. He is impulsive, restless, and proud and acts instantly without thinking.

CHATZIAVATIS is hypersensitive and protective of others, afraid to live for himself. Thus, his love for Rigopoula becomes platonic, replacing the possibility of consummation with the suffering of endless romantic loneliness.

RIGOPOULA is the idol of Freedom and Joy, who acquires human form through the aspirations and visions of others. She also represents the Greek concept of Gaea, or Mother Earth, endangered by irresponsible resource management, improper treatment of drastic changes in the ecosystem, and uncoordinated humanitarian efforts towards a common future.

VELIGKEKAS is the compulsive authoritarian, perceiving power as validation of his uniqueness and personal accomplishments.

BARBAGIORGOS is the innocent, self-confident man who lives impulsively, unable to comprehend the impact of his spontaneous choices.

ΕΛΛΗΝΙΚΑ:

"Ο Δήμος Αβδελιώδης, ένας από τους σημαντικότερους  σύγχρονους Έλληνες δημιουργούς του θεάτρου και του κινηματογράφου, έχει συνδέσει το όνομά του με πρωτοποριακές παραστάσεις και ταινίες, που άνοιξαν νέους δημιουργικούς δρόμους στην Τέχνη, με διεθνή αναγνώριση. "

Μας λέει για την καινούργια του ταινία:

Η Tέχνη έχει προορισμό να εμπνέει και να δημιουργεί στους ανθρώπους ενθουσιασμό και πίστη για τη ζωή.

Το αίσθημα που κυριαρχεί σε μια περίοδο κρίσης είναι η ανασφάλεια  που δημιουργεί φόβο, αμφιβολία και αρνητικά αισθήματα.

Το αντίθετο του φόβου δεν είναι το θάρρος, αλλά η δημιουργία κι η αγάπη, γιατί δεν αφήνουν ούτε χρόνο, ούτε χώρο στον φόβο.

Πιστεύω σ’ έναν κινηματογράφο που δεν πρέπει ν’ αμφιβάλει, να καταγγέλλει και να φοβίζει τους θεατές, αλλά να τους ενθουσιάζει.

Πιστεύω σ’ έναν κινηματογράφο που γίνεται όχι για ν’ αναδειχθεί ο σκηνοθέτης, αλλά οι ιδέες που υπερασπίζεται το έργο του.

Πιστεύω σ’ έναν κινηματογράφο που δεν γίνεται για να εντυπωσιάσει τους θεατές, αλλά για να τους συγκινήσει. Εφόσον συγκίνηση δεν είναι μόνον η διασκέδαση αλλά κι η ψυχαγωγία.

Να συ(ν) κινείται δηλαδή και να πάλλεται συντονισμένη η ψυχή όλων μας έτσι που να μην μας χωρίζει, αλλά να μας Ενώνει.

Με τα ίδια πιστεύω επανέρχομαι στον κινηματογράφο με τη νέα ταινία:                     

«ΤΟ ΣΑΤΥΡΙΚΟ ΔΡΑΜΑ ΤΩΝ ΑΘΗΝΩΝ» *

 Με τη δική σας βοήθεια θα μπορέσω να την πραγματοποιήσω.

(*)Το Σατυρικό Δράμα, που ενέπνευσε και τον τίτλο της ταινίας, ανάγεται στο τρίτο διακριτό είδος του Αρχαίου Δράματος μετά την Τραγωδία και την Κωμωδία κι έχει χαρακτήρα ονειρικό και παιγνιώδη, με διαρκείς ανατροπές από το δραματικό στο κωμικό.

ΛΙΓΑ ΛΟΓΙΑ ΓΙΑ ΤΗΝ ΤΑΙΝΙΑ

Σε μια ξέγνοιαστη Πολιτεία που ζούσε  ο Καραγκιόζης,  ένας  Δράκος καταλαμβάνει ξαφνικά το μοναδικό Υδραγωγείο της Πόλης, και απαιτεί να τρώει κάθε μέρα όσους ανθρώπους θέλει, για να εξακολουθεί να παρέχει νερό στους κατοίκους της.

Ο Βεζύρης, ο Ανώτατος Άρχων της Πόλης, με την έγκριση του Δράκου, αποφασίζει να γίνεται αδέκαστη και αδιάβλητη κλήρωση, για το ποιά θα είναι καθημερινά τα θύματα του Δράκου. Αναθέτει στον έμπιστό του αγγελιοφόρο Χατζηαβάτη, να τους ανακοινώνει το μαντάτο μυστικά πριν το χάραμα, ώστε με το πρώτο φως της μέρας να μπορούν οι κάτοικοι να παίρνουν νερό χωρίς να διαταράσσεται η  κοινωνική γαλήνη και τάξη. 

Μια μέρα ο κλήρος πέφτει στη μοναχοκόρη του ίδιου του Βεζύρη, την θεϊκής ομορφιάς Ρηγοπούλα…

---------------

Πρόκειται για ένα ονειρόδραμα με κωμικά και δραματικά στοιχεία, που αντιμετωπίζουν με ξεχωριστή ματιά το θέμα της οικονομικής και κοινωνικής κρίσης που υπάρχει σήμερα παγκόσμια και ιδιαίτερα στην Ελλάδα.

Ήρωες της ταινίας είναι οι γνωστές φιγούρες του ελληνικού θεάτρου Σκιών, Καραγκιόζης, Μεγαλέξανδρος, Χατζηαβάτης, Βεληγκέκας κ.α, που παίζονται από ηθοποιούς.

Εμφανίζονται επίσης κατά τον ίδιο τρόπο, ήρωες από την ευρωπαϊκή παράδοση και τη λογοτεχνία, όπως ο Μικρός Πρίγκιπας, ο Μολυβένιος στρατιώτης και ο Δον Κιχώτης με τον Σάντσο Πάντσα.

Η αισθητική κι οι διάλογοι, που εμπνέονται απ’ το μοναδικό ύφος του θεάτρου Σκιών, κάνουν όλες τις σκηνές συναρπαστικές, με αποκορύφωμα την μάχη του μικρού Αλέξανδρου απέναντι στον Δράκο.

Μ’ αυτά τα δεδομένα χτίζεται μια ταινία πρωτότυπη που απευθύνεται σε όλες τις ηλικίες,  ανεξαρτήτως της εθνικότητας και της παιδείας τους.

ΟΙ ΚΥΡΙΟΙ ΧΑΡΑΚΤΗΡΕΣ

ΚΑΡΑΓΚΙΟΖΗΣ: Ο σύγχρονος πλανητικός άνθρωπος που πεινάει και διψάει, προσπαθώντας να επιβιώσει με κάθε τρόπο. Προσαρμόζει την πραγματικότητα σε μια δική του εκδοχή, την οποία πιστεύει και κάνει τα πάντα για να πετύχει τον σκοπό του, ακόμα κι αν είναι ανέφικτος.

ΜΕΓΑΛΕΞΑΝΔΡΟΣ: Έχει αγνή, παιδική ψυχή γεμάτη αγάπη, που δεν αφήνει κανένα απολύτως χώρο στον φόβο. Είναι παρορμητικός, αεικίνητος, περήφανος και δρα ακαριαία χωρίς να το σκεφτεί.

ΧΑΤΖΗΑΒΑΤΗΣ: Υπερευαίσθητος και προστατευτικός για τους άλλους, φοβάται να ζήσει ο ίδιος πραγματικά. Έτσι ο έρωτάς του για την Ρηγοπούλα γίνεται πλατωνικός, αυτοαποκλείοντας την πιθανότητα να τον πραγματοποιήσει, βάζοντας στη θέση του τον πόνο της ατέρμονης ρομαντικής μοναχικότητας.

ΡΗΓΟΠΟΥΛΑ: Το ίνδαλμα της Ελευθερίας και της Χαράς,  που αποκτά  Μορφή, μέσα από τις εκάστοτε προσδοκίες και τους οραματισμούς των ανθρώπων. Στο συγκεκριμένο έργο, ο ρόλος αυτός υπαινίσσεται και την έννοια της Γαίας(Γης), του πλανήτη που κινδυνεύει από την έλλειψη σωστής οικολογικής διαχείρισης της ενέργειας, των πόρων και την έλλειψη συνειδητών και υπεύθυνων ενεργειών για τη εφικτή λύση του προβλήματος, που έχει δημουργηθεί στο οικοσυστήμα.

ΒΕΛΗΓΚΕΚΑΣ: Η αυταρχική και ψυχαναγκαστική εκδοχή του οργάνου εξουσίας, που την εκλαμβάνει ως αυτοεπιβεβαίωση της μοναδικότητάς του και της προσωπικής του καταξίωσης.

ΜΠΑΡΜΠΑΓΙΩΡΓΟΣ: Ο αθώος, γεμάτος αυτοπεποίθηση άνθρωπος  που ζει παρορμητικά την κάθε στιγμή χωρίς να μπορεί να προβλέψει τ’ αποτελέσματα των αυθόρμητων επιλογών του.

What We Need & What You Get

The pilot shooting is finished, not only the quality of the final result is ensured, but also the enthusiasm and the consistency of all who are involved in the project.

We are asking for your participation and support to raise at least €50000 for the:

1) rent of the plateau.

2) rent of the equipment (camera and sound packages, electric/lighting, etc).

3) construction of sceneries.

so that we can start shooting by March 2019 at the latest, in order for the film to be screened in November 2019.

Any additional amount will cover other necessary expenses.

We believe that we can make it WITH YOUR HELP! That is why we tried to develop attractive incentives for you at every level. From a simple “thank you” to aprivate screening of the movie on your premises! Have a look at our perks and choose the correct for you!

ΕΛΛΗΝΙΚΑ

Έχουν γίνει τα πιλοτικά γυρίσματα που μας έχουν εξασφαλίσει την ποιότητα του τελικού αποτελέσματος, αλλά και τον ενθουσιασμό και την σύμπνοια όλων των συντελεστών

και ζητούμε τη δική σας συμμετοχή και τη συνδρομή, για να συγκεντρώσουμε τουλάχιστον €50.000 για:

1) την ενοικίαση του πλατώ,

2) του εξοπλισμού (κάμερα, ήχος / φώτα)

3) την κατασκευή σκηνικών,

που θα μας επιτρέψει να ξεκινήσουμε τα γυρίσματα, το αργότερο έως τον Μάρτιο του 2019, ώστε να είναι έτοιμη η ταινία για προβολή στις αίθουσες τον Νοέμβριο του 2019.

Ό,τι συγκεντρωθεί παραπάνω θα πάει σε άλλες απαραίτητες δαπάνες.

Πιστεύουμε ότι μπορούμε να το καταφέρουμε ΜΕ ΤΗΝ ΒΟΗΘΕΙΑ ΣΑΣ! 

Σας παραθέτουμε διάφορα ανταποδοτικά οφέλη που ελπίζουμε να σας αρέσουν. Από ένα απλό "ευχαριστώ" μέχρι μιά αποκλειστική προβολή στο χωρο σας με την παρουσία του Σκηνοθέτη.

The Impact

This film aims to awaken to its viewers the sentiments of creativity, unselfish love and solidarity reinforcing self-confidence and creative spirit.

ΕΛΛΗΝΙΚΑ

Αυτή η ταινία αποσκοπεί στο να ξυπνήσει στους θεατές συναισθήματα δημιουργικότητας,  ανιδιοτελoύς αγάπης και αλληλεγγύης, ενισχύοντας την αυτοπεποίθησή και το δημιουργικό πνεύμα.

Risks & Challenges


1. It is the first time a movie is made with the figures of the heroes of the Greek shadow puppet theatre portrayed by human actors.

2. These heroes are transferred to today’s time by representing real modern human characters.

3. The film is addressed to all ages and to all ethnicities combining fun with entertainment

The most difficult and exhausting stage of a movie is the preparation and rehearsal process. Shooting, in a plateau, undisturbed by external influences and with well prepared actors, leaves no chance for failure.

ΕΛΛΗΝΙΚΑ

1. Είναι η πρώτη φορά που γίνεται ταινία με τις φιγούρες των ηρώων του Θεάτρου Σκιών, παιγμένους από ηθοποιούς.

2. Οι ήρωες αυτοί μεταφέρονται στο σήμερα, εκπροσωπώντας σύγχρονους πραγματικούς ανθρώπινους χαρακτήρες.

3. Η ταινία απευθύνεται σε όλες τις ηλικίες και σε όλες τις εθνότητες, συνδυάζοντας την διασκέδαση με την ψυχαγωγία.

Το πιο δύσκολο και εξαντλητικό στάδιο μιας ταινίας είναι η προετοιμασία και οι πρόβες. Τα γυρίσματα μέσα σε πλατό, όπου δεν επηρεάζονται καθόλου από τις εξωτερικές συνθήκες, και με τους ηθοποιούς να έχουν άρτια προετοιμασία, δεν αφήνουν καμιά πιθανότητα αποτυχίας.

Other Ways You Can Help

I can't contribute financially, how else can I help? Δεν μπορώ να συνεισφέρω οικονομικά, πώς αλιώς μπορώ να βοηθήσω?

Please get the word out and let everybody know about our campaign! 

Use the Indiegogo share tools! Tell all your friends to come check us out and help us reach our goal! Spread the word!

ΕΛΛΗΝΙΚΑ

Παρακαλώ, διάδωσε και ενημέρωσε όλους για την καμπάνια μας!

What if I don't want a perk, I just want to contribute? Μπορώ να συνεισφέρω χωρίς ανταποδοτικό όφελος?​

Sure thing! Click on the "BACK IT" button, add the additional amount and do not select any perk. 

ΕΛΛΗΝΙΚΑ

Βεβαίως! Απλά πάτησε το κουμπί  "BACK IT",συμπλήρωσε ότι ποσόν θέλεις και μην διάλεξεις ανταποδοτικό όφελος.

How can we contact you? Πώς μπορώ να επικοινωνήσω μαζί σας?

Glad you asked! You can contact us through this page! And we will answer all our questions!

ΕΛΛΗΝΙΚΑ

Καλά που ρώτησες! Μέσω αυτής της ιστοσελίδας και θα απαντήσουμε σε όποια ερώτηση έχεις!
story_txt:
Short Summary Για Ελληνικά κυλίστε σε κάθε ενότητα πιο κάτω !"Dimos Avdeliodis, one of the most significant contemporary Greek theatre and cinema artists, has associated his name with pioneering  performances and movies, which opened up new creative ways in Art, with international recognition.." He says about his new film:Art is intended to inspire and create enthusiasm to people and faith in life.The feeling that dominates in a period of crisis is insecurity, which creates fear, doubt and negative feelings.The opposite of fear is not courage but creation and love,  because they do not leave neither time nor space to fear.I believe in a cinema that
focuses on ideas rather than showcasing a director,
fascinates its audience rather than scares or condemns them, and
emotionally moves them through education and entertainment rather than through only sensational amusement and distractions.
Therefore, cinema should touch our hearts and not divide us but unite us all.With these firm beliefs, I return to the movie scene with my new film:“THE SATYRICAL DRAMA OF ATHENS”*Preparation has been completed and I seek your support in order to be able to start shooting the film to be eligible on time for competitions at upcoming international film festivals.(*) The Satyrical Drama, which gave the inspiration for the title of this film, goes back to the third distinct genre of Ancient Drama, following Tragedy and Comedy. It combines dreamlike and playful aspects, with unpredictable transitions from drama to comedy.About the movieIn a carefree state, where Karaghiozis lives, a Dragon suddenly occupies the city's only Aqueduct, and demands to eat as many people as he wants every day, in order to continue supplying water to his inhabitants.Veziris, the Supreme Lord of the City, decides, with the approval of the Dragon, that everyday Dragon’s victim will be determined by a fair and indisputable draw. He gives his trusted messenger Chatziavatis the assignment to secretly inform the victims of their fate before the dawn, so that by the first light of day the inhabitants can make use of the Aqueduct without the social peace and order disturbed.One day the draw falls on Veziri’s only daughter, the divinely beautiful Rigopoula…..----------------The film is a “dream-like” drama with comedic elements that addresses the current economic issues and social crisis plaguing the world, especially Greece.The main characters are historical figures of the Greek shadow puppet theatre: Karaghiozis, Chatziavatis, Velighekas and others, who are now portrayed by human actors.Similarly, heroic and past figures of European tradition and literature also appear: the Little Prince, the Tin Soldier and Don Quixote with Sancho Pancha, all to show how the global crisis intertwines with the Greek domestic crisis.The aesthetics and dialogues inspired by the unique style of the Shadow Theatre ensure exciting scenes throughout the entire movie, which culminates in the battle of little Alexander with the Dragon.All these elements make for an original film, suited for all ages, regardless of their nationality and educational background.THE MAIN CHARACTERSKARAGHIOZIS is the modern man, hungry and thirsty, who tries to survive in any way he can, seeing his problems as fate as well as an impetus for new adventures. He adapts reality to his own perceptions of truth, attempting anything to reach his goals regardless of practicality.ALEXANDER THE GREAT is the pure, childlike soul who is full of love, with no room for fear. He is impulsive, restless, and proud and acts instantly without thinking.CHATZIAVATIS is hypersensitive and protective of others, afraid to live for himself. Thus, his love for Rigopoula becomes platonic, replacing the possibility of consummation with the suffering of endless romantic loneliness.RIGOPOULA is the idol of Freedom and Joy, who acquires human form through the aspirations and visions of others. She also represents the Greek concept of Gaea, or Mother Earth, endangered by irresponsible resource management, improper treatment of drastic changes in the ecosystem, and uncoordinated humanitarian efforts towards a common future.VELIGKEKAS is the compulsive authoritarian, perceiving power as validation of his uniqueness and personal accomplishments.BARBAGIORGOS is the innocent, self-confident man who lives impulsively, unable to comprehend the impact of his spontaneous choices.ΕΛΛΗΝΙΚΑ:"Ο Δήμος Αβδελιώδης, ένας από τους σημαντικότερους  σύγχρονους Έλληνες δημιουργούς του θεάτρου και του κινηματογράφου, έχει συνδέσει το όνομά του με πρωτοποριακές παραστάσεις και ταινίες, που άνοιξαν νέους δημιουργικούς δρόμους στην Τέχνη, με διεθνή αναγνώριση. "Μας λέει για την καινούργια του ταινία:Η Tέχνη έχει προορισμό να εμπνέει και να δημιουργεί στους ανθρώπους ενθουσιασμό και πίστη για τη ζωή.Το αίσθημα που κυριαρχεί σε μια περίοδο κρίσης είναι η ανασφάλεια  που δημιουργεί φόβο, αμφιβολία και αρνητικά αισθήματα.Το αντίθετο του φόβου δεν είναι το θάρρος, αλλά η δημιουργία κι η αγάπη, γιατί δεν αφήνουν ούτε χρόνο, ούτε χώρο στον φόβο.Πιστεύω σ’ έναν κινηματογράφο που δεν πρέπει ν’ αμφιβάλει, να καταγγέλλει και να φοβίζει τους θεατές, αλλά να τους ενθουσιάζει.Πιστεύω σ’ έναν κινηματογράφο που γίνεται όχι για ν’ αναδειχθεί ο σκηνοθέτης, αλλά οι ιδέες που υπερασπίζεται το έργο του.Πιστεύω σ’ έναν κινηματογράφο που δεν γίνεται για να εντυπωσιάσει τους θεατές, αλλά για να τους συγκινήσει. Εφόσον συγκίνηση δεν είναι μόνον η διασκέδαση αλλά κι η ψυχαγωγία.Να συ(ν) κινείται δηλαδή και να πάλλεται συντονισμένη η ψυχή όλων μας έτσι που να μην μας χωρίζει, αλλά να μας Ενώνει.Με τα ίδια πιστεύω επανέρχομαι στον κινηματογράφο με τη νέα ταινία:                     «ΤΟ ΣΑΤΥΡΙΚΟ ΔΡΑΜΑ ΤΩΝ ΑΘΗΝΩΝ» * Με τη δική σας βοήθεια θα μπορέσω να την πραγματοποιήσω.(*)Το Σατυρικό Δράμα, που ενέπνευσε και τον τίτλο της ταινίας, ανάγεται στο τρίτο διακριτό είδος του Αρχαίου Δράματος μετά την Τραγωδία και την Κωμωδία κι έχει χαρακτήρα ονειρικό και παιγνιώδη, με διαρκείς ανατροπές από το δραματικό στο κωμικό.ΛΙΓΑ ΛΟΓΙΑ ΓΙΑ ΤΗΝ ΤΑΙΝΙΑΣε μια ξέγνοιαστη Πολιτεία που ζούσε  ο Καραγκιόζης,  ένας  Δράκος καταλαμβάνει ξαφνικά το μοναδικό Υδραγωγείο της Πόλης, και απαιτεί να τρώει κάθε μέρα όσους ανθρώπους θέλει, για να εξακολουθεί να παρέχει νερό στους κατοίκους της.Ο Βεζύρης, ο Ανώτατος Άρχων της Πόλης, με την έγκριση του Δράκου, αποφασίζει να γίνεται αδέκαστη και αδιάβλητη κλήρωση, για το ποιά θα είναι καθημερινά τα θύματα του Δράκου. Αναθέτει στον έμπιστό του αγγελιοφόρο Χατζηαβάτη, να τους ανακοινώνει το μαντάτο μυστικά πριν το χάραμα, ώστε με το πρώτο φως της μέρας να μπορούν οι κάτοικοι να παίρνουν νερό χωρίς να διαταράσσεται η  κοινωνική γαλήνη και τάξη. Μια μέρα ο κλήρος πέφτει στη μοναχοκόρη του ίδιου του Βεζύρη, την θεϊκής ομορφιάς Ρηγοπούλα…---------------Πρόκειται για ένα ονειρόδραμα με κωμικά και δραματικά στοιχεία, που αντιμετωπίζουν με ξεχωριστή ματιά το θέμα της οικονομικής και κοινωνικής κρίσης που υπάρχει σήμερα παγκόσμια και ιδιαίτερα στην Ελλάδα.Ήρωες της ταινίας είναι οι γνωστές φιγούρες του ελληνικού θεάτρου Σκιών, Καραγκιόζης, Μεγαλέξανδρος, Χατζηαβάτης, Βεληγκέκας κ.α, που παίζονται από ηθοποιούς.Εμφανίζονται επίσης κατά τον ίδιο τρόπο, ήρωες από την ευρωπαϊκή παράδοση και τη λογοτεχνία, όπως ο Μικρός Πρίγκιπας, ο Μολυβένιος στρατιώτης και ο Δον Κιχώτης με τον Σάντσο Πάντσα.Η αισθητική κι οι διάλογοι, που εμπνέονται απ’ το μοναδικό ύφος του θεάτρου Σκιών, κάνουν όλες τις σκηνές συναρπαστικές, με αποκορύφωμα την μάχη του μικρού Αλέξανδρου απέναντι στον Δράκο.Μ’ αυτά τα δεδομένα χτίζεται μια ταινία πρωτότυπη που απευθύνεται σε όλες τις ηλικίες,  ανεξαρτήτως της εθνικότητας και της παιδείας τους.ΟΙ ΚΥΡΙΟΙ ΧΑΡΑΚΤΗΡΕΣΚΑΡΑΓΚΙΟΖΗΣ: Ο σύγχρονος πλανητικός άνθρωπος που πεινάει και διψάει, προσπαθώντας να επιβιώσει με κάθε τρόπο. Προσαρμόζει την πραγματικότητα σε μια δική του εκδοχή, την οποία πιστεύει και κάνει τα πάντα για να πετύχει τον σκοπό του, ακόμα κι αν είναι ανέφικτος.ΜΕΓΑΛΕΞΑΝΔΡΟΣ: Έχει αγνή, παιδική ψυχή γεμάτη αγάπη, που δεν αφήνει κανένα απολύτως χώρο στον φόβο. Είναι παρορμητικός, αεικίνητος, περήφανος και δρα ακαριαία χωρίς να το σκεφτεί.ΧΑΤΖΗΑΒΑΤΗΣ: Υπερευαίσθητος και προστατευτικός για τους άλλους, φοβάται να ζήσει ο ίδιος πραγματικά. Έτσι ο έρωτάς του για την Ρηγοπούλα γίνεται πλατωνικός, αυτοαποκλείοντας την πιθανότητα να τον πραγματοποιήσει, βάζοντας στη θέση του τον πόνο της ατέρμονης ρομαντικής μοναχικότητας.ΡΗΓΟΠΟΥΛΑ: Το ίνδαλμα της Ελευθερίας και της Χαράς,  που αποκτά  Μορφή, μέσα από τις εκάστοτε προσδοκίες και τους οραματισμούς των ανθρώπων. Στο συγκεκριμένο έργο, ο ρόλος αυτός υπαινίσσεται και την έννοια της Γαίας(Γης), του πλανήτη που κινδυνεύει από την έλλειψη σωστής οικολογικής διαχείρισης της ενέργειας, των πόρων και την έλλειψη συνειδητών και υπεύθυνων ενεργειών για τη εφικτή λύση του προβλήματος, που έχει δημουργηθεί στο οικοσυστήμα.ΒΕΛΗΓΚΕΚΑΣ: Η αυταρχική και ψυχαναγκαστική εκδοχή του οργάνου εξουσίας, που την εκλαμβάνει ως αυτοεπιβεβαίωση της μοναδικότητάς του και της προσωπικής του καταξίωσης.ΜΠΑΡΜΠΑΓΙΩΡΓΟΣ: Ο αθώος, γεμάτος αυτοπεποίθηση άνθρωπος  που ζει παρορμητικά την κάθε στιγμή χωρίς να μπορεί να προβλέψει τ’ αποτελέσματα των αυθόρμητων επιλογών του.What We Need & What You GetThe pilot shooting is finished, not only the quality of the final result is ensured, but also the enthusiasm and the consistency of all who are involved in the project.We are asking for your participation and support to raise at least €50000 for the:1) rent of the plateau.2) rent of the equipment (camera and sound packages, electric/lighting, etc).3) construction of sceneries.so that we can start shooting by March 2019 at the latest, in order for the film to be screened in November 2019.Any additional amount will cover other necessary expenses.We believe that we can make it WITH YOUR HELP! That is why we tried to develop attractive incentives for you at every level. From a simple “thank you” to aprivate screening of the movie on your premises! Have a look at our perks and choose the correct for you!ΕΛΛΗΝΙΚΑΈχουν γίνει τα πιλοτικά γυρίσματα που μας έχουν εξασφαλίσει την ποιότητα του τελικού αποτελέσματος, αλλά και τον ενθουσιασμό και την σύμπνοια όλων των συντελεστώνκαι ζητούμε τη δική σας συμμετοχή και τη συνδρομή, για να συγκεντρώσουμε τουλάχιστον €50.000 για:1) την ενοικίαση του πλατώ,2) του εξοπλισμού (κάμερα, ήχος / φώτα)3) την κατασκευή σκηνικών,που θα μας επιτρέψει να ξεκινήσουμε τα γυρίσματα, το αργότερο έως τον Μάρτιο του 2019, ώστε να είναι έτοιμη η ταινία για προβολή στις αίθουσες τον Νοέμβριο του 2019.Ό,τι συγκεντρωθεί παραπάνω θα πάει σε άλλες απαραίτητες δαπάνες.Πιστεύουμε ότι μπορούμε να το καταφέρουμε ΜΕ ΤΗΝ ΒΟΗΘΕΙΑ ΣΑΣ! Σας παραθέτουμε διάφορα ανταποδοτικά οφέλη που ελπίζουμε να σας αρέσουν. Από ένα απλό "ευχαριστώ" μέχρι μιά αποκλειστική προβολή στο χωρο σας με την παρουσία του Σκηνοθέτη.The ImpactThis film aims to awaken to its viewers the sentiments of creativity, unselfish love and solidarity reinforcing self-confidence and creative spirit.ΕΛΛΗΝΙΚΑΑυτή η ταινία αποσκοπεί στο να ξυπνήσει στους θεατές συναισθήματα δημιουργικότητας,  ανιδιοτελoύς αγάπης και αλληλεγγύης, ενισχύοντας την αυτοπεποίθησή και το δημιουργικό πνεύμα.Risks & Challenges1. It is the first time a movie is made with the figures of the heroes of the Greek shadow puppet theatre portrayed by human actors.2. These heroes are transferred to today’s time by representing real modern human characters.3. The film is addressed to all ages and to all ethnicities combining fun with entertainmentThe most difficult and exhausting stage of a movie is the preparation and rehearsal process. Shooting, in a plateau, undisturbed by external influences and with well prepared actors, leaves no chance for failure.ΕΛΛΗΝΙΚΑ1. Είναι η πρώτη φορά που γίνεται ταινία με τις φιγούρες των ηρώων του Θεάτρου Σκιών, παιγμένους από ηθοποιούς.2. Οι ήρωες αυτοί μεταφέρονται στο σήμερα, εκπροσωπώντας σύγχρονους πραγματικούς ανθρώπινους χαρακτήρες.3. Η ταινία απευθύνεται σε όλες τις ηλικίες και σε όλες τις εθνότητες, συνδυάζοντας την διασκέδαση με την ψυχαγωγία.Το πιο δύσκολο και εξαντλητικό στάδιο μιας ταινίας είναι η προετοιμασία και οι πρόβες. Τα γυρίσματα μέσα σε πλατό, όπου δεν επηρεάζονται καθόλου από τις εξωτερικές συνθήκες, και με τους ηθοποιούς να έχουν άρτια προετοιμασία, δεν αφήνουν καμιά πιθανότητα αποτυχίας.Other Ways You Can HelpI can't contribute financially, how else can I help? Δεν μπορώ να συνεισφέρω οικονομικά, πώς αλιώς μπορώ να βοηθήσω?Please get the word out and let everybody know about our campaign! Use the Indiegogo share tools! Tell all your friends to come check us out and help us reach our goal! Spread the word!ΕΛΛΗΝΙΚΑΠαρακαλώ, διάδωσε και ενημέρωσε όλους για την καμπάνια μας!What if I don't want a perk, I just want to contribute? Μπορώ να συνεισφέρω χωρίς ανταποδοτικό όφελος?​Sure thing! Click on the "BACK IT" button, add the additional amount and do not select any perk. ΕΛΛΗΝΙΚΑΒεβαίως! Απλά πάτησε το κουμπί  "BACK IT",συμπλήρωσε ότι ποσόν θέλεις και μην διάλεξεις ανταποδοτικό όφελος.How can we contact you? Πώς μπορώ να επικοινωνήσω μαζί σας?Glad you asked! You can contact us through this page! And we will answer all our questions!ΕΛΛΗΝΙΚΑΚαλά που ρώτησες! Μέσω αυτής της ιστοσελίδας και θα απαντήσουμε σε όποια ερώτηση έχεις!

story:
Carter Ciaran is an experienced local theatre actor, whose dreams and ambitions minimize everything else in his personal life. His intense preparation of method acting that includes never breaking character alienates him from local productions intimidated by him and from his family who are estranged from him. However, when Carter is preparing for a new lead role as a clown, he receives news that his sister is on her deathbed. The choice Carter ultimately needs to make is to either follow his artistic aspirations or be there for his loved ones in the greatest time of need.

 

 

Producer - Lukya Rong

Lukya spent her childhood in the beautiful international city of Shanghai, China. She came to Canada since she was 15 and went to a high school in Victoria. She is currently pursuing a Bachelors of Fine Arts (BFA) degree in Theatre Design and Production in the University of British Columbia (UBC), specializing in the areas of Stage Management and Lighting Design. In China she has worked on the set of Honda Motorcycle advertisement shooting and Chinese reality TV show HuaYangNanTuan.  Now she is in Vancouver Film School and successfully produced an episodic.

 

Director - Raffinand Akiji

Raffi has been an avid film fan literally ever since he could remember. He has studied screenwriting, film theory, media analysis, and media management at The New School in NYC and have been in snug company with young creatives, from painters to musicians to filmmakers. As a storyteller, he knows how to structure a story as well as crafting visually literate, fully cinematic work. He has written numerous short film scripts, plays, edited plays for high school productions, currently working on a feature film script, had multiple runs of movie review blogs, and was a judge for the Winter Film Awards in NYC. He continues to study filmmaking at Vancouver Film School.

 

Director of Photography - Pong Lertvanangkul

Growing up in Bangkok in an upper middle class family, Pong has not experienced much hardship in life. He grew up in a loving home went through his life as any normal person is expected to live. He first went to The Regents International School in Bangkok and then Bromsgrove International School. At the age of 12 he had his first experience studying abroad when he transferred to Broadrick Secondary School, spending two and a half years there. After finishing his secondary education in Singapore he moved on to study in Shoreline Community College in Seattle for a year before moving back to finish his Bachelor’s Degree at Assumption University in Thailand. There he discovered his passion in Film and Music.

 

Assistant Director - Suraj Savkoor

Suraj Savkoor, an aspiring writer and director, is always shooting for the stars. When he’s not out making awesome movies, he’s at home watching them. Film is his life. He dreams of making it to the big stage someday and he hopes to have directed his first feature by the end of 2019.

 

Production Designer - Daniel 'Sith" del Castillo

Started studies on Mechatronic engineering but carried on as a graphic designer/animator at Universidad de las Americas Puebla; now studying at Vancouver Film School.

Daniel specializes on acrylic painting and illustrating, his work firstly reached the insurance company Aserta where he worked for a year as a graphic designer and teaching new computer design techniques such as 3D and Photoshop, now hoping to expand on his art he is reaching to become a Production designer.

 

Editor - Jokin Urquiola

Jokin Urquiola was born in Mexico City in 1986. He studied Audio Engineering in London focusing in sound design for films. After graduating he began working in short films and later on as a sound editor of Netflix series and other films. After developing a bigger interest in films and its production he went on to study Film Production of Vancouver Film School in 2018.

 

We have successfully raised half of our budget through investors, and we hope to raise the other half through Indiegogo crowdfunding. We need money to help increase our production value by hiring the right cast, a sound design team, and the most important, locations for shooting. 

 

 

 

 

No matter if you donate $5 or $100, you will receive a private link to watch ‘The Act’ when it’s available.

We are giving away online movie link, posters, social media shout out, and a lot more fun stuff behind the scenes, so you can enjoy the shooting process with us.

Moreover, you can be part of the movie by getting a" Special Thanks Credit" at the end of our movie with all the crew members. 

 

This film is a very personal project and one that we believe will connect with audiences deeply. It is a unique perspective of the careers and choices we make in our lives to find happiness and meaning. We feel many people will identify some truth in this bizarre, beautiful film and will embrace the vision that is offered with this project.

 

 

Like all film projects, there will be unexpected variables and obstacles that will arise, large and small. However, our team is confident in our skills and talent, knowledgeable about what it takes to work on a film set, and passionate about our project so whatever hurdles come our way, we are well prepared to overcome any problem that arises throughout production.

 

We understand not everyone has the spare cash to donate, no worries!

Help us share our campaign page and spreading the word would be a massive help as well!!!

Thank you so much.

From The Act crew

Production Designer - Daniel 'Sith" del Castillo

Started studies on Mechatronic engineering but carried on as a graphic designer/animator at Universidad de las Americas Puebla; now studying at Vancouver Film School.
Daniel specializes on acrylic painting and illustrating, his work firstly reached the insurance company Aserta where he worked for a year as a graphic designer and teaching new computer design techniques such as 3D and Photoshop, now hoping to expand on his art he is reaching to become a Production designer.
 
Editor - Jokin Urquiola

Jokin Urquiola was born in Mexico City in 1986. He studied Audio Engineering in London focusing in sound design for films. After graduating he began working in short films and later on as a sound editor of Netflix series and other films. After developing a bigger interest in films and its production he went on to study Film Production of Vancouver Film School in 2018.
 

We have successfully raised half of our budget through investors, and we hope to raise the other half through Indiegogo crowdfunding. We need money to help increase our production value by hiring the right cast, a sound design team, and the most important, locations for shooting. 
 
 

 
 

No matter if you donate $5 or $100, you will receive a private link to watch ‘The Act’ when it’s available.
We are giving away online movie link, posters, social media shout out, and a lot more fun stuff behind the scenes, so you can enjoy the shooting process with us.
Moreover, you can be part of the movie by getting a" Special Thanks Credit" at the end of our movie with all the crew members. 

 

This film is a very personal project and one that we believe will connect with audiences deeply. It is a unique perspective of the careers and choices we make in our lives to find happiness and meaning. We feel many people will identify some truth in this bizarre, beautiful film and will embrace the vision that is offered with this project.

 
 

Like all film projects, there will be unexpected variables and obstacles that will arise, large and small. However, our team is confident in our skills and talent, knowledgeable about what it takes to work on a film set, and passionate about our project so whatever hurdles come our way, we are well prepared to overcome any problem that arises throughout production.

 

We understand not everyone has the spare cash to donate, no worries!
Help us share our campaign page and spreading the word would be a massive help as well!!!
Thank you so much.
From The Act crew
instagram: TheAct_shortfilm

story:
Since conceiving of the film early this summer, I’ve put together a small, dedicated production team experienced in Film Production, Editing, Media Promotion and Information Technology. In just 5 months, we've already put over 350 hours into planning and researching the story, as well as shooting our first three interviews with Maritime musicians. 
 

 

I spent nearly 10 years in the 2000s running a Music Label and Promotion organization, releasing Maritime Metal albums and setting up concerts. The Metal scene was a big part of my 20s and like many of you, I found being so deeply involved in it was a great time. For a lot of you, it still is! Now it's time to show the world how great Maritime Metal bands and fans really are, by taking part in making this film a reality.


What We Need

Our budget needed to cover Travel, Equipment, and all other Production Cost is $30K. But just as important, we need your participation and contribution of Footage and Photos. So please share and send us what you've got so we have all the footage we need to tell a visually compelling history of the Maritime Metal scene.


What You Get for Contributing

  • A Kick-Ass, Hand-Numbered, Professionally Printed Film on BluRay
  • Collectible Hand-Numbered Cassette Tapes (Just like we had in the 90s) featuring the film's Soundtrack
  • A high quality Movie Poster along with a Maritime Metal T-shirt
  • Tickets to Film Premiere Screenings in Moncton, NB and Halifax, NS
  • Exclusive, Limited chance to get 1 of 10 Packages including Hand-Numbered and Signed BluRay and Soundtrack, with a Special Thanks in the film credits and on IMDB

All Perks are exclusive to this IndieGoGo Campaign.
No hand numbered copies will be sold outside of the Campaign.


The Impact

We're considering, you, the Maritime Metal scene, as part of our team. Your contribution is priceless. We have 3 decades of history to capture for the big screen. A history that we believe is interesting not only to us Maritimers, but to all Metal Heads and Music Fans around the world.

 

Our team has the knowledge to put this film together. from being their ourselves to the film industry experience. So let’s get this done together! We are passionate about telling this story in a medium we love, in a way that's never been seen before in the Maritimes.

Risks & Challenges

Our main risk is spending considerable time and money traveling from Montreal to the Maritimes. We'll be recording many, many interviews with key players in the Metal community. For us, this means paying for travel, food, lodging, film permits, and more.

The second hurdle we need to overcome is the cost of mastering, promoting and releasing the film and soundtrack on a physical medium. We'll need to pay for printing, shipping, and advertising. 

I know we are capable of this. I have released a number of albums, put on over 25 concerts, designed countless posters and album artworks as well as created many websites while I was part of the Maritime Metal scene. With your crowdfunding support, we'll raise the budget to complete the film.


Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word!
Share this IndieGoGo page on Social Media. Go wild. Throw it on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, wherever! Write about our campaign in your blogs. Tell your friends and family. Send us the Footage and Photos you want included in the documentary, and if you have been a part of the scene and have a story to tell, contact us to be Interviewed.


Check us out on:

https://maritimemetaldoc.com
Facebook
Instagram

story:
FROM THE DIRECTOR

Director - Ivan Gostev

   

Ivan Gostev is an award-winning director and producer based in London. He first started directing for the stage in Cambridge while a student of the university. Ivan’s debut in film was a TV Pilot, Bloody Cakes, starring Ingeborga Dapkunaite (Mission Impossible, Seven Years in Tibet, Academy Award-winning Burnt by the Sun). In 2017 the pilot was picked up and is currently produced in Georgia, to be directed by Ivan this fall. As co-founder and Head of Production of REC Studios, Ivan produced and directed several commercials, including, The Little History of Crime (winner of ‘Best Commercial’ at BELIFF London Film Festival). Ivan is currently working on a Moscow-based documentary for Gazprom Mosenergo. In 2016 Ivan hosted an international screenwriting contest with a jury featuring Andrey Zvyagintsev (Leviathan, Loveless) and Nick Powell (ex-director of NFTS).

 

HELP US #UNFREEZE. 

The teaser you just saw was a little something for us to warm up on before the big shoot and to demonstrate our commitment. We shot this with 8 minutes worth of film roll literally cutting it on the set. Brrr... That set is freezing. We're still in there. Please help... 

 

THE FILM

Two detectives, the hardboiled misanthrope John and the idealistic recruit Mark, puzzle over the extremely violent death of Bill in his penthouse. The only suspect is Bill's wife who, splattered with blood, claims they were cooking when she left to the bathroom and came back five minutes later to find Bill already dead.

We follow the detectives’ imagined scenarios to get to the truth but each has his own agenda, and the truth soon becomes irrelevant, and the consequences are disastrous.

 

WHO ARE REC STUDIOS?

We exist to tell simple, emotional and provocative stories. Be they stories for brands or narrative-based drama, this is what we live for. Commercial work is our main bread and butter but the main objective is to keep making our original films with a deep focus on drama. Dinner for One is one of the building blocks in this endeavour and we need your help to make it happen.

 

WHY MAKE THIS FILM?

We are well aware that this is not a classic "festival film", i.e. one telling the story of a cancerous grandmother whose aids-driven transgender grandson rescues her pet and then realises a profound truth about the universe. Our film doesn't achieve any of that.

What we want is to offer entertainment and to tell a story which will excite, beguile and challenge you, our audience. We believe that this is what filmmaking is all about. As David Mamet wrote, "people have tried for centuries to use drama to change people's lives, to influence, to comment, to express themselves. It doesn't work. It might be nice if it worked for those things, but it doesn't. The only thing the dramatic form is good for is telling a story." Help us tell this one and become a part of it!

We are confident that Dinner for One will have a life of its own unrelated to its success in the festival game, but will, of course, send the film to the biggest festivals, including Cannes, Toronto, Berlinale and Telluride. We're sure there will be viewers out there who share our love for black comedy and our take on storytelling. So, viewers' votes... here we come!

 

THE CREATIVE CREW

 

DOP – Karol Jurga

      

For five years Karol Jurga was one of the head Directors of Photography at Sony Music. Now in freelance, Karol is a genius of visual storytelling with award-winning work in drama and commercial projects under his belt, including films for Nao, Balenciaga and Steinway.

Dinner for One is to be shot on 35mm film in a homage to film noir which is where the story has its roots.

Writer - Sam Jacob

Born in Ireland, Sam Jacob showed promise as a young child, his teachers not believing his creative writing homework could have possibly been conceived by a five-year-old. We’d like to think his gift has improved since he was five, through life experiences such as living on a boat in the South Pacific as a teenager, where he crashed into the Great Barrier Reef, and met (friendly) cannibals. Making short films from the age of eight, Sam returned to Ireland where he continued to hone his skills as a storyteller. Sam started working as a freelance filmmaker at the age of seventeen and went on to study screenwriting at Prague Film School. He returned to Ireland where he worked as an editor and assistant cameraman for several years, before doing a Masters in Screenwriting at Met Film School in London, completed in 2016. Sam is currently working on a TV series set in Georgia (the country not the state).

Costume Design - Simon Ekrelius

   

Born in Stockholm / Sweden and since 2002 based in London, Ekrelius received the Swedish Fashion Talent 2015 award after many years of actively working in the fashion industry, showing his work in Paris and London. His work featured in British Vogue, Elle Japan, Dazed and many more. Ekrelius was educated at Stockholm's Tailoring Academy and at F.I.T Florence. His portfolio includes stylist and costume design work for commercials with Channel 4, Arla, Wella, Fashion Cares, British American Tobacco and Tesco, and music artists including The Catherine Wheel, The Plasticines, Love Inc, Lucie Barât & The Au Revoirs.Illustrator & Storyboardist - Ben Barter

Ben Barter is our extremely talented illustrator in charge of all the artwork for the film. Based in the Heart of England, Ben has developed a range of innovative projects for clients such as Santander, Macmillian Education, NHS, IAAF, SEGA and many more. Ben has a unique style which he brings to bear across the many mediums he works in, from animation and graphic design to character design and book illustration.

 

CAST 

 

 

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

We already have c.a. 20% of the overall budget (£5000) and rely on your help to get the rest. It's a three-day shoot so everything we rent is times three, hence the weighty budget.

The money you invest will go towards paying our award-winning cast (£2600), special effects & stunts (£1000), location (£4500), kit & crew (£12000), grading and OST composition (£600). We believe in paying professionals for their work and getting the job done well, despite having done some tough negotiating to bring every cost to its minimum.

For your money, you will get a range of cool perks, including actual film props, signed script and poster, an invitation to a London-based premiere, day on set and original artworks and storyboards for the film, not to mention a chance of being the Executive Producer with an IMDb credit. 

We need to reach the minimum of £21,000 for the project to take off but ideally, want to raise £23,000 for festival fees and marketing.

 

LOCATION

This is where the murder happens... One of our inspirations for the aesthetic of the location was Edward Hopper whose works are striking with their eerie and sinister tone, ideal for a noir mystery.

 

Risks & Challenges

It's a short story but a bloody hard one to film. Bill's violent death is visualised in a series of scenarios which means a continuity nightmare and a big challenge for our art director. We're also shooting on film, which means fewer takes and more rehearsals. But we like a challenge.

 

Other Ways You Can Participate

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Be kind and use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Sharing to social media and following us there will help massively and even unlock special rewards!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
'Teams can hardly score 500, never mind one single man!' - Sir Curtly Ambrose

 

Help us make this feature length documentary. We have already begun so we know it WILL happen and people are super excited about it already. But we need YOUR help.

 

What are we aiming to do?

25 years on from Brian Lara’s world-record breaking innings for Warwickshire at Edgbaston, ‘501 not out’ tells the story of cricket’s first global superstar. It is hoped that the film will feature interviews with Lara and his close friend Dwight Yorke. It will also feature his former international and county team-mates from the historic treble winning season, Bears fans who witnessed the marathon knock first-hand and current legends of the game inspired by his heroics. Featuring rarely seen archive footage and stills, the film also examines the wider impact of the innings – coming so soon after the test record 375 - on Lara’s life and the world of cricket – including the sponsorship deals and the popular video game series - and how it helped to shape the careers of current icons Ian Bell, AB De Villiers, Chris Gayle and the ‘Burnley Lara’ James Anderson. 

But who are we?

Iconic Productions is a Royal Television Society award nominated independent production company based in Birmingham. Director Sam Lockyer brings a wealth of experience to Iconic having previously worked in the TV industry for Atlantic Productions on documentaries for Five/Discovery including Apollo 13: The Inside Story and Jack The Ripper: The First Serial Killer. In 2014 Sam was employed on a freelance basis by Blue Hippo Media as Archive Researcher on their feature documentary film ‘Bicycle’ which screened successfully at independent cinemas across the world. In 2015 Sam directed, produced and edited ‘Rugby: A Midlands Story’ – a short documentary film which celebrated the origins and heritage of the sport and screened at the opening ceremony of the Rugby World Cup at the birthplace of the game. The film was subsequently shortlisted in the ‘Best Factual Programme’ category at the RTS Midlands awards in November 2016. Sam is a lifelong cricket fan and passionate supporter of Warwickshire CCC and England. He also plays club cricket recreationally.

Official Partner of ‘501 – not out’:

''If you wanted to pay to watch someone play, Brian would be at the top of that list' - Ian Bell

'Brian just went and batted, he was a genius, an absolute legend' - Graeme Welch

Warwickshire County Cricket Club are on board as an official partner of ‘501 not out’. They are providing our creative team with access to contributors for the film including Ian Bell, Chris Woakes, Ashley Giles, Gladstone Small, Dennis Amiss and fans who ‘were there’ on the day. Last summer at Edgbaston we were privileged to shoot a fantastic interview about Lara and his 501* with the legendary West Indian fast bowler Sir Curtly Ambrose. More recently we were honoured to interview five-time Ashes winner and England hero Ian Bell in addition to Lara’s Warwickshire team-mate Graeme Welch. The club will also be helping with promotion of our forthcoming crowd-funding campaign. The BBC’s chief Cricket correspondent Jonathan ‘Aggers’ Agnew is also on board and is supportive of the project.

The money we raise through this campaign will help towards the funding of the following:

- Filming of the key interviews and other footage this autumn / winter.

- Archive acquisition and clearances.

- Editing and all post production ahead of the film's release.

We are also actively gaining sponsorship support from major brands towards the film but the crowd funding is our way to give cricket fans a chance to get involved with the project.

 

If you are not able to support by taking up one of our amazing rewards then YOU can help by simply telling and sharing about the project with others.

Thank you!

 

HERE ARE THE FANTASTIC REWARDS AVAILABLE:

PRE-GAME CHEER - £20: (UNLIMITED!!)

Get the HD digital download of the film 1 week before its official release.

OPENING THE BATTING - £40 (50 TO BE CLAIMED!!)

We are offering an amazing chance to get your name in the credits of the film PLUS receive the HD digital download 1 week before its official release.

CELEBRATE IN STYLE - £60: (20 TO BE CLAIMED!!)

Limited Edition 501 T-shirt from the world famous Edgbaston shop featuring iconic image of Lara & scoreboard.

As a backer of '501 not out' your name will be featured in the credits at the end of the film!

1 x HD Digital Download 1 week before official film release.

Exclusive access to additional content & 'Behind-the-Scenes' updates.

POWER HITTER - £75: (20 TO BE CLAIMED!!)

1 x T20 match ticket for a Birmingham Bears match in 2019

Your name will be featured in the credits at the end of the film!

1 x HD Digital Download 1 week before the film's official release. 

1 x limited edition poster.

Access to exclusive content & 'Behind-the-Scenes' updates.

100 NOT OUT ('CENTURION') - £100 (25 TO BE CLAIMED!!)

Get to meet the film team and attend a rough cut screening of the film ahead of it being finished and have your say in what we are making. This is an absolute must for anyone interested in Cricket and Film! Plus you get all the other lovely perks too!

CRICKET & F1 GAMING FAN!! - £100 (5 TO BE CLAIMED!!)

A very special one for the Cricket AND Formula 1 fan with thanks to our good friends at Codemasters - the team behind the classic 'Brian Lara Cricket' video game series. You will get: A copy of F1 2018 game on the platform of your choice (PC, X Box One, PS4 - Let us know!) F1 2018 T-shirt, mug, lanyard, notebook & pen. + All the other perks!!

ASHES TRIP - £350 (2 TO BE CLAIMED - JUST 1 LEFT!!)

YOUR CHANCE TO EXPERIENCE THE FIRST ASHES TEST OF 2019!! 2 x TICKETS TO THE EDGBASTON TEST MATCH AGAINST THE AUSSIES IN AUGUST 2019 PLUS ALL OF THE OTHER GREAT PERKS!

ASSOCIATE PRODUCER - £750 (4 TO BE CLAIMED!!)

YOUR NAME IN THE OPENING CREDITS OF THE FILM ON A SHARED SLATE

4 X DIGITAL DOWNLOADS OF THE FILM TO SHARE

1 X TICKET TO SEMI FINAL OF WORLD CUP 2019 

PRIVATE VIEWING TO SEE ROUGH CUT OF FILM WITH FILMMAKERS.

MEET AND GREET WITH WARWICKSHIRE PLAYERS.

VIP TICKETS X 2 TO WORLD PREMIERE & AFTER PARTY OF THE FILM.

SIGNED BOOK BY SIR CURTLY AMBROSE

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER (£2,000 - 1 TO BE CLAIMED!)

YOUR NAME IN THE OPENING CREDITS OF THE FILM ON A SINGLE SLATE.

8 X DIGITAL DOWNLOADS OF THE FILM TO SHARE.

2 X TICKET TO SEMI FINAL OF WORLD CUP 2019.

PRIVATE VIEWING TO SEE THE ROUGH CUT FILM WITH THE FILMMAKERS.

MEET AND GREET WARWICKSHIRE PLAYERS AT CHOSEN MATCH.

VIP TIKS X 4 TO WORLD PREMIERE AND AFTER PARTY OF THE FILM.

SIGNED SHIRT.

But who are we?
Iconic Productions is a Royal Television Society award nominated independent production company based in Birmingham. Director Sam Lockyer brings a wealth of experience to Iconic having previously worked in the TV industry for Atlantic Productions on documentaries for Five/Discovery including Apollo 13: The Inside Story and Jack The Ripper: The First Serial Killer. In 2014 Sam was employed on a freelance basis by Blue Hippo Media as Archive Researcher on their feature documentary film ‘Bicycle’ which screened successfully at independent cinemas across the world. In 2015 Sam directed, produced and edited ‘Rugby: A Midlands Story’ – a short documentary film which celebrated the origins and heritage of the sport and screened at the opening ceremony of the Rugby World Cup at the birthplace of the game. The film was subsequently shortlisted in the ‘Best Factual Programme’ category at the RTS Midlands awards in November 2016. Sam is a lifelong cricket fan and passionate supporter of Warwickshire CCC and England. He also plays club cricket recreationally.
Official Partner of ‘501 – not out’: 


''If you wanted to pay to watch someone play, Brian would be at the top of that list' - Ian Bell
'Brian just went and batted, he was a genius, an absolute legend' - Graeme Welch
Warwickshire County Cricket Club are on board as an official partner of ‘501 not out’. They are providing our creative team with access to contributors for the film including Ian Bell, Chris Woakes, Ashley Giles, Gladstone Small, Dennis Amiss and fans who ‘were there’ on the day. Last summer at Edgbaston we were privileged to shoot a fantastic interview about Lara and his 501* with the legendary West Indian fast bowler Sir Curtly Ambrose. More recently we were honoured to interview five-time Ashes winner and England hero Ian Bell in addition to Lara’s Warwickshire team-mate Graeme Welch. The club will also be helping with promotion of our forthcoming crowd-funding campaign. The BBC’s chief Cricket correspondent Jonathan ‘Aggers’ Agnew is also on board and is supportive of the project.

The money we raise through this campaign will help towards the funding of the following:
- Filming of the key interviews and other footage this autumn / winter.
- Archive acquisition and clearances.
- Editing and all post production ahead of the film's release.
We are also actively gaining sponsorship support from major brands towards the film but the crowd funding is our way to give cricket fans a chance to get involved with the project.
 
If you are not able to support by taking up one of our amazing rewards then YOU can help by simply telling and sharing about the project with others.
Thank you!

Limited Edition 501 T-shirt from the world famous Edgbaston shop featuring iconic image of Lara & scoreboard.
As a backer of '501 not out' your name will be featured in the credits at the end of the film!

Your name will be featured in the credits at the end of the film!
